segments.text: Excuse me , sir , Is this the road to the peace Store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could get there this way , but it'd be faster to go along the Wort Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Turn right at the third intersection , you'll see the street and then walk along the street to the south .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How far is it from the Wort Street ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just walk for a few minutes , you'll find it .
segments.speaker: S2
